about_the_game:
Lone Killers of the Southwest


Five deadly real-life gunmen stalked the Wild West.

This feature details five of 'em: Clay Allison, Black Bart, John Wesley Hardin, Deacon Jim Miller, and Dave Rudabaugh.

Each one has their history, stats, and Story Seeds, all ready for your Deadlands campaign!

Converted by: Scott Geeding

Released on May 13, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.8 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
